name: 5G Network Performance Metrics Analysis
instruction: Evaluate key performance indicators and metrics specific to 5G networks to assess overall network health and efficiency.

name: 5G QoS Parameters Analysis
instruction: Analyze the Quality of Service parameters in 5G networks to ensure they meet the required service standards.

name: 5G UE Traffic Volume Analysis
instruction: Examine the volume of user equipment traffic in 5G networks to identify usage patterns and capacity requirements.

name: 5G UE Network Jitter and CQI Analysis
instruction: Assess jitter and Channel Quality Indicator (CQI) in 5G user equipment to evaluate network stability and quality.

name: 5G Anomaly Detection
instruction: Detect and investigate anomalies in 5G network operations to maintain network integrity and performance.

name: 5G UE Jitter Analysis with Outliers
instruction: Perform jitter analysis in 5G networks, focusing on outlier detection to identify irregular network behavior.

name: 5G Performance Analysis by Geotype
instruction: Compare and contrast 5G network performance across different geographical types, such as urban, suburban, and rural areas.

name: 5G Per User Capacity Increase Analysis
instruction: Calculate and analyze the increase in per-user capacity brought by 5G technology, compared to previous generations.

name: 5G Average Traffic Per User Analysis
instruction: Measure and analyze the average data traffic per user in a 5G network to understand user behavior and network usage.

name: 5G Investment Cost Analysis
instruction: Evaluate the cost-effectiveness of investments in 5G infrastructure by analyzing the expenses and benefits.
